thread.title: Hannah Stocking Tweets That She Caught Klay Thompson Cheating With “Groupie”
thread.title_full: Hannah Stocking Tweets That She Caught Klay Thompson Cheating With “Groupie”

author: Jason Fletcher
title: Hannah Stocking Tweets That She Caught Klay Thompson Cheating With “Groupie”
text:
Hannah Stocking Tweets That She Caught Klay Thompson Cheating With “Groupie” RantSports.com 3 days ago Jason Fletcher © Getty Images Klay Thompson got called out on Twitter by his girlfriend as she says she caught him cheating with a "groupie." Golden State Warriors guard Klay Thompson made headlines yesterday when he responded to some comments made by Los Angeles Clippers head coach Doc Rivers about Rivers saying that the Warriors had “luck” on their side to avoid the Clippers and San Antonio Spurs in the Western Conference playoffs last season. That full article is here .
AdChoices On Saturday, Thompson is making headlines for a whole different set of circumstances. Apparently his model girlfriend Hannah Stocking came home to catch Thompson in bed with what she referred to as a “groupie.”
Here’s a screenshot of the tweets, which have since been deleted:
© Provided by Rantsports.com BroBible BroBible
Bad move, Klay. Bad move.
